name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Innovative Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance solutions in healthcare and finance. Strong expertise in **gRPC**, **REST APIs**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and **Python**, complemented by solid skills in **Rust**. Proficient in building and implementing **CI/CD pipelines** that optimize development processes and enhance product quality. Known for problem-solving capabilities and a collaborative approach to team dynamics, ensuring effective communication and delivery on project goals. Experienced in modern frameworks and technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at developing and deploying cloud-native applications on Azure and AWS, with a strong background in building secure, maintainable microservices and event-driven systems that adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. A proactive leader in MLOps, experienced in deploying ML pipelines and managing workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to creating solutions that drive tangible results and adapt to evolving industry needs.

experience.responsibilities:

• Developed and integrated **REST APIs** and **gRPC** for seamless communication between microservices and client applications, enhancing system interoperability.
• Led the re-architecture of monolithic applications into microservices-based ecosystems with **Kubernetes** (specifically **AKS/EKS**) ensuring efficient resource management and fault tolerance.
• Collaborated with team members in a dynamic, agile environment, promoting effective **team collaboration** to deliver robust software solutions in a timely manner.

• Established test strategies using **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving over **90%** test coverage for both front-end and backend services, contributing to higher software reliability.
• Utilized **Python** for machine learning model development, successfully deploying models that achieved **85%** accuracy for use cases including patient risk prediction and financial fraud detection.
• Integrated advanced search functionalities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, enabling efficient retrieval across millions of structured and unstructured records.
• Designed cloud-native data architecture using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing for large-scale data ingestion and querying, leading to processing improvements of up to **30%** in response times.
• Demonstrated strong **problem solving** skills by developing innovative solutions to complex challenges in healthcare and finance applications.

Enhanced system integration and communication through **gRPC** and **REST APIs**, supporting seamless interactions across distributed microservices for financial platforms.
